name: Honey Clicker
description:
[Warning, needs to be played in full screen. itch page formatting blocks some of the buttons]

Honey clicker is a simple idle game build in the model of cookie clicker, click on the honey comb to get get 1 honey per click then use some of your honey to buy bee hives and other things to produce honey for you.

Honey clicker was also built for the "stop waiting for godot" jam. despite the theme being "keep it simple" and joining the jam a day late I had originally wanted to include a simple story and some additional mechanics but ran out of time so they might be included in a later version.
